name: Dream Warrior
description:
Dream Warrior ~ if you ever wanted to traverse an alternate universe of never ending glitching color spectrum in 2 and a half dimensions... you dream has come true.
Plz enjoy!

First game from Palgal
Music by YlangYlang

Listen to the soundtrack here ~
http://ylangylang.bandcamp.com/album/dream-warrior...

*don't be afraid of the dark
screen when loading....

**glitch intended

***NOW with ESC and Restart (R)

Thanks to the generous support of Matt Hammill, Sagan Yee, TAIS and Hand-eye Society

There are a few easter eggs in the vast open ocean
